title: Pediatric Asthma Treatment Education: Patient-Centered Treatment Strategies and Learning Object Utilization

context.prior_knowledge: General understanding of basic medical terminology and disease management concepts
context.additional_context: Language Pedagogy Integration: Medical Communication & Patient Education Material Development

learning_goals: Learners can explain the pathological mechanisms of pediatric asthma and the principles of pharmacological treatment.
Learners can design patient-caregiver collaboration strategies by applying the Therapeutic Patient Education (TPE) framework.
Learners can develop and evaluate asthma management educational content using digital learning objects (LOs).

resources: Learning object authoring tool (e.g., H5P, Articulate)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
